Two Skygraspers are transferred to the Archangel when it joins with the Earth Alliance`s 8th Fleet, and after the ship descends to Earth, Mu La Flaga begins using one of these atmospheric fighters in place of his Moebius Zero mobile armour.

character.name: Agamemnon-kyuu Uchuu Bokan
character.description: This 300-meter warship is designed primarily as a carrier, and it can rapidly deploy large numbers of mobile armors using its two linear catapults. Warships of the Agamemnon class, like Admiral Halberton`s Menelaos, often serve as flagships for the Earth Alliance`s space fleets.

character.name: METEOR
character.description: The Mobile suit Embedded Tactical EnfORcer, or METEOR, is an armed module designed to support the Freedom Gundam and Justice Gundam. These METEOR units serve as gun turrets while attached to the hull of the warship Eternal, and when detached they can dock with a Gundam and draw energy from its nuclear engine. The METEOR is equipped with powerful thrusters for high-speed flight, and its beam cannons, missile launchers, and beam swords give it the firepower of a space warship. Since the Freedom and Justice have the ability to lock onto multiple targets, they can use the METEOR`s battery of long-range weapons to intercept dozens of enemies simultaneously.

character.name: ZGMF-1017 GINN
character.description: The first combat mobile suit developed by ZAFT, and the backbone of its military forces. The fighting strength of the GINN is equivalent to that of five Earth Alliance mobile armours, and can singlehandedly destroy an Alliance escort ship. Although the GINN is classified as a Zero Gravity Maneuver Fighter, it can operate on Earth as well, and this versatile machine can be adapted to a wide range of mission roles and combat environments. Its standard armament consists of a machine gun and a blade for slicing apart enemy mobile armours, but the GINN can also be outfitted with a variety of heavy weapons and guided missiles.

character.name: TMF/A-802 BuCUE
character.description: This four-legged mobile suit is the main weapon of ZAFT`s ground forces. Its quadrupedal design makes the BuCUE very stable even in difficult terrain like deserts and snowfields, and its legs are equipped with caterpillar tracks for high-speed movement in these environments. The turret hardpoint on its back can carry either powerful railguns or a large missile pod, and after the Earth Alliance`s prototype Gundams fall into ZAFT`s hands, many BuCUE units are fitted with head-mounted beam sabers based on the technology of these captured Gundams.

character.name: FFMH-Y101 Eternal
character.description: A new ZAFT warship, created to support the nuclear-powered Freedom and Justice Gundams, which is equipped with special facilities for maintaining these unique mobile suits. In addition to a pair of METEOR units, which function as gun turrets while docked with the ship, the Eternal is armed with a single cannon turret and countless batteries of missile launchers. After it is stolen by Lacus Clyne and her followers, this ship joins forces with the Archangel and the Kusanagi to form the independent Three Ships Alliance.

character.name: Nazca
character.description: The Nazca-class high-speed destroyer which serves as the flagship of the Le Creuset team. This is ZAFT`s newest model of warship, armed with powerful beam cannons and faster than even the Earth Alliance`s Archangel. Its central deck can house six mobile suits, and is equipped with a linear catapult for high-speed take-offs.

character.name: MBF-02 Strike Rouge
character.description: After the Strike Gundam is destroyed in battle, it is salvaged and rebuilt by the engineers of Morgenroete, who later use the spare parts created during this repair process to construct a duplicate of the original mobile suit. The Strike Rouge is equipped with a power extender to increase its operating time, and as a result its colours are red-shifted when its Phase Shift Armor is activated. It also has an AI (Artificial Intelligence) support system to assist inexperienced pilots. The parts for the Strike Rouge are carried into space aboard the warship Kusanagi, and when the mobile suit is assembled it becomes Cagalli Yula Athha`s personal machine.

character.name: MBF-M1 Astray
character.description: The final production version of the Astray series, designed for use by the Orb Union`s national defence forces. The M1 Astray was developed by Morgenroete, using technology that the company obtained from its work on the Earth Alliance`s GAT-X series. Based on the prototype Gundam Astray, this machine has been redesigned for mass production, and is equipped with a backpack flight unit inspired by the Strike Gundam`s Aile Striker pack. The M1 is more than a match for the mass-produced mobile suits of ZAFT and the Earth Alliance, but its production and deployment have been delayed until its operating system can be adapted for use by Natural pilots.

character.name: Orb Kaigun Aegis Kan
character.description: The Aegis ships which guard the territorial waters of the Orb Union use a trimaran construction, in which the ship`s hull is divided into three sections. Armed with batteries of anti-air and anti-ship weapons, as well as three aircraft decks which can be used to deploy combat helicopters, these ships are capable of driving off even ZAFT mobile suits.

character.name: ZGMF-X56S Impulse Gundam
character.description: The Impulse Gundam is a prototype mobile suit created by ZAFT as part of its Second Stage series. The Second Stage machines use a number of new technologies to deal with the restrictions of the Junius Treaty that ended the previous war, such as a deuterion beam transmission system that allows them to receive an instant energy recharge from their mothership. Because the treaty places strict limits on the number of mobile suits each side can maintain, the Impulse is designed to adapt to a wide range of combat situations by exchanging Silhouette packs, and the mobile suit itself is made up of three separate modules that can be launched and replaced individually. The young ZAFT pilot Shinn Asuka uses the tactical flexibility of this unique machine to tremendous effect.

character.name: ZGMF-X23S Saviour Gundam
character.description: The Saviour Gundam is a prototype mobile suit created by ZAFT as part of its Second Stage series. This transformable machine is designed for aerial combat, and it can change into a mobile armor form to carry out high-speed hit-and-run attacks using its powerful beam cannons. Because its development has fallen behind that of the other Second Stage machines, the Saviour escapes capture at Armory One, and Chairman Durandal subsequently offers it to the former Justice Gundam pilot Athrun Zala.

character.name: ZGMF-1000 ZAKU Warrior
character.description: The ZAKU Warrior, whose name stands for ZAFT Armed Keeper of Unity, is part of a new series of mass production mobile suits developed by ZAFT after the end of the previous war. The ZAKU was originally intended to use a nuclear engine, but after the conclusion of the Junius Treaty it was redesigned with a conventional battery system instead. Its overall performance is nonetheless very high, and it can adapt to a variety of combat situations using specialized Wizard backpacks. In the hands of an expert pilot, the ZAKU is a match even for the newest Gundam mobile suits.

character.name: ZGMF-601R GuAIZ R
character.description: A minor update to the GuAIZ introduced in the last stages of the previous war. Its R designation stands for Reinforced. Instead of the extensional arrestors of the original version, the GuAIZ R is armed with a pair of railguns for greater medium-range firepower, and the dual beam claw in its shield has been replaced by a single beam saber. This upgraded machine served as the main mobile suit of the ZAFT forces until the introduction of the ZAKU series.

character.name: TFA-4DE GAZuOOT
character.description: An upgraded version of the ZuOOT used during the previous war. Although the GAZuOOT remains unsuitable for combat against enemy mobile suits, its increased firepower and improved fire control systems enable it to provide more effective fire support than the original version. Because the previous shoulder cannons have been replaced with beam cannons, its model number includes the designation DE for Directional Emission. The GAZuOOT also carries a set of large missiles, and its arms end in cannons instead of general-purpose manipulator hands.

character.name: UMF/SSO-3 ASH
character.description: A new model of amphibious mobile suit used by ZAFT special forces, whose SSO designation stands for Support/Special Operations. The ASH is designed for covert operations rather than regular combat, and its arms are equipped with lethal close-combat weapons instead of normal manipulators. It can also change into a compact mobile armor form for underwater cruising.

character.name: AMA-953 BABI
character.description: A new model of transformable mobile suit designed for aerial combat and classified as an Aerial Maneuver Attacker. Currently being deployed as a successor to the DINN, the BABI has far greater firepower than its predecessor. In mobile armor form, its high speed and the anti-air weapons installed in its wings make the BABI an effective interceptor, and in mobile suit form it can use the Ardor beam cannon in its chest to attack and destroy large ground targets.

character.name: ZGMF-2000 GOUF Ignited
character.description: The GOUF Ignited, whose name stands for Guardian Of Unity Forerunner, was developed by ZAFT as a candidate for its next-generation mass production mobile suit. Although the ZAKU series was selected instead, the development of the GOUF continued due to its high performance, and a handful of prototype machines have been assigned to ace pilots such as Heine Westenfluss. The GOUF carries an arsenal of powerful close combat weapons, including a double-edged beam sword and retractable whips that inflict damage via high-frequency vibration, and the flight unit attached to its back gives it superb mobility and the ability to fly in Earth`s atmosphere. The mass production model is coloured blue, some ace pilots have their suits in different colour schemes.

character.name: LHM-BB01 Minerva
character.description: The Minerva is the first new ZAFT warship constructed since the previous war. Designed for use with Second Stage series mobile suits, it is equipped with a deuterion beam transmitter that can instantly recharge these machines, as well as a complex system of hangars and catapults for launching the components of the Impulse Gundam. The Minerva is also a formidable warship in its own right thanks to its powerful weapons, high speed, and ability to enter the atmosphere and operate on Earth. Due to an attack on Armory One the day before its scheduled launching ceremony, the Minerva and its inexperienced crew soon find themselves on the front lines of a new conflict.

character.name: ZGMF-X24S Chaos Gundam
character.description: The Chaos Gundam is a prototype mobile suit developed by ZAFT as part of its new Second Stage series. This transformable assault machine can change into a mobile armor form specialized for high-speed space combat, and armed with powerful beam cannons and beam claws. The Chaos is also equipped with a pair of mobile weapon pods similar to the DRAGOON system used in the previous war, and its improved control system allows these weapons to be used even by ordinary pilots. After the Chaos Gundam is captured during the attack on Armory One, it is assigned to Sting Oakley of the Phantom Pain special forces unit.

character.name: ZGMF-X88S Gaia Gundam
character.description: The Gaia Gundam is a prototype mobile suit developed by ZAFT as part of its new Second Stage series. Designed for close combat on land, it can change into a four-legged mobile armor form that resembles the BuCUE used during the previous war, and in this form it can use the beam blades installed in its attitude control wings to slice through enemy mobile suits. After the Gaia Gundam is captured during the attack on Armory One, it is assigned to Stella Loussier of the Phantom Pain special forces unit.

character.name: ZGMF-X31S Abyss Gundam
character.description: The Abyss Gundam is a prototype mobile suit developed by ZAFT as part of its new Second Stage series. Its mobile suit form has tremendous firepower thanks to its arsenal of beam weapons and shell-firing cannons, and it carries a lance equipped with both a beam blade and a physical blade, enabling this weapon to be used even underwater. It can also change into a mobile armor form for underwater combat, although in this form it relies mainly on its guided torpedo launchers. After the Abyss Gundam is captured during the attack on Armory One, it is assigned to Auel Neider of the Phantom Pain special forces unit.

character.name: GAT-02L2 Dagger L
character.description: The standard mass production mobile suit of the Earth Alliance forces. The Dagger L is an improved version of the Dagger series introduced during the previous war, and it inherits the Strike Gundam`s ability to adapt to various combat situations using interchangeable Striker packs. On Earth, these machines are typically equipped with Jet Striker packs that render them capable of atmospheric flight. A black version known as the Dark Dagger L is also employed by special forces such as Phantom Pain.

character.name: GAT-04 Windam
character.description: A new model of mass production mobile suit created as a successor to the Dagger series. Like the Dagger L, the Windam can be adapted to various combat situations using interchangeable Striker packs, allowing the Earth Alliance to maintain its numerical advantage by using the same versatile machine in every battlefield. This machine uses the same beam sabers and Stiletto weapons as its predecessor, but carries a larger beam rifle and a new type of shield. After the Phantom Pain special forces unit is transferred to Earth, its commander Neo Roanoke enters combat using a Windam painted in his distinctive personal colors.

character.name: YMAF-X6BD Zamza-Zah
character.description: The Zamza-Zah is part of a new series of mobile armors developed for the Earth Alliance by Adukurf Mechano-Industries. This huge machine is operated by a three-person crew made up of a commander, a pilot, and a gunner. Armed with powerful guns and a set of claws that inflict damage via high-frequency vibration, the Zamza-Zah can perform attacks in any direction and at all ranges, and the positron reflector on its upper surface generates a protective barrier that can deflect even the Minerva`s Tannhauser cannon. The Earth Alliance deploys one of these machines to attack the Minerva during its escape from the Orb Union.

character.name: YMAG-X7F Gells-Ghe
character.description: The Gells-Ghe is part of a series of huge mobile armors developed for the Earth Alliance by Adukurf Mechano-Industries. Like the Zamza-Zah, it is equipped with a positron reflector capable of deflecting any enemy attack, and since this system is mounted on the front of its body the Gells-Ghe is ideal for defending fixed positions such as Gulnahan`s Lohengrin Gate. This unusual machine is also distinguished by its six insect-like legs and by the mobile suit torso, derived from the old Strike Dagger, that serves as its upper body. The Gells-Ghe is controlled by a three-person crew in the same fashion as the Zamza-Zah.

character.name: GFAS-X1 Destroy Gundam
character.description: The Destroy Gundam is less of a mobile suit than a mobile gun platform. What this hulking behemoth lacks in mobility, it makes up for with a massive arsenal designed for indiscriminate destruction. The Destroy is also equipped with the same positron reflector shield featured on the Zamza-zah and Gells-ghe, rendering most incoming enemy fire ineffective. To punish Europe for sympathizing with ZAFT, LOGOS sends the first Destroy unit to Berlin, where it swats aside the ZAFT forces and lays waste to the city and its populace. By the time the Freedom is able to stop the Destroy`s rampage, this weapon of mass destruction has singlehandedly razed most of the city to the ground...

character.name: TS-MA4F Exus
character.description: The personal mobile armor of Phantom Pain commander Neo Roanoke. In addition to its linear guns and missile launchers, the Exus also carries a set of Gunbarrels based on the remote weapons used by the Moebius Zero. Its fighting strength is thus remarkably high, and it can battle several ZAFT mobile suits simultaneously. However, this mobile armor is designed exclusively for space combat and can`t be used in Earth`s atmosphere.

character.name: Girty Lue
character.description: The mysterious vessel that serves as Phantom Pain`s mothership during the attack on Armory One. The Girty Lue is equipped with a Mirage Colloid system that enables it to turn invisible, a technology which was supposedly outlawed by the Junius Treaty that ended the previous war, and although its design and armament resemble those of Earth Alliance warships this vessel appears to operate outside the bounds of the regular military. In addition to its Mirage Colloid capabilities, the Girty Lue can also be equipped with a stealth system that propels the ship with jets of gas in order to avoid detection by thermal sensors.

character.name: Nelson class
character.description: An updated version of the 250-meter warship that serves as the main force of the Earth Alliance`s space fleets. The Nelson class is now capable of carrying mobile suits, and has been equipped with a pair of linear catapults to launch them into battle. Together with its high firepower and defensive strength, the ability to carry mobile suits makes the Nelson class an exceptionally well-balanced warship.

character.name: Drake class
character.description: An updated version of the Earth Alliance`s 130-meter escort ship. Although it now has linear catapults for launching mobile suits, the carrying capacity of the Drake class is very limited, and it is used mainly to supplement the larger ships or to carry out reconnaissance missions.

character.name: MVF-M11C Murasame
character.description: A next-generation mass production mobile suit used by the Orb Defense Forces. While the previous M1 Astray was designed mainly for land warfare, the Murasame can change into a fighter form for aerial combat and interception, and it boasts high performance in space as well. This all-purpose machine is more than a match for the latest ZAFT and Earth Alliance mobile suits, and serves as a testimonial to Orb`s advanced military technology. The veteran pilot Andrew Waltfeld has his own Murasame painted in distinctive personal colors.

character.name: Takemikazuchi
character.description: This large aircraft carrier, commanded by the capable Captain Todaka, is the flagship of the Orb expeditionary fleet. The Takemikazuchi uses the same trimaran construction as Orb`s distinctive Aegis ships, and it can carry large numbers of mobile suits on its two-level deck. Its six catapults are used for launching Murasame mobile suits in fighter form, while its complement of M1 Astray Shrikes simply use their hovering capabilities to take off from the upper deck.

character.name: King Takeda
character.description: King Takeda is a guest appearance of producer http://anidb.net/cr1516 [Takeda Seiji] in some minor http://anidb.net/a2186 [Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED Destiny] roles.

episode.title: 怒れる瞳
Angry Eyes
Un regard en colère
Ikareru Hitomi
episode.summary: In year 72 of the Cosmic Era, the Junius Treaty brought the hostilities between ZAFT and the Earth Alliance to a formal conclusion. The treaty banned all military use of nuclear weapons and nuclear power, and placed strict limits on the size of the ZAFT and Earth Alliance forces. However, there are still tensions between the genetically enhanced Coordinators and the unmodified Naturals, and the peace between them remains fragile. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦いを呼ぶもの
Those Who Call for War
Les racines de la guerre
Tatakai o Yobu Mono
episode.summary: With Armory One under attack, Athrun commandeers a ZAFT mobile suit to get Cagalli to safety. The three captured Gundams engage Athrun`s ZAKU in combat, but he is rescued by the sudden appearance of the young ZAFT pilot Shinn Asuka and his Impulse Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 予兆の砲火
Warning Shots
Le feu de la prémonition
Yochou no Houka
episode.summary: Shinn and Rey struggle against the enemy commander Neo Roanoke. In order to help her pilots, ZAFT Captain Talia Gladys orders the newly constructed warship Minerva to launch from Armory One and join the battle. The enemy forces withdraw, and the Minerva gives chase. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星屑の戦場
Stardust Battlefield
Bataille parmi les poussières d`étoiles
Hoshikuzu no Senjou
episode.summary: The Minerva follows the Girty Lue into the debris belt that surrounds Earth, and sends Shinn and his comrade Lunamaria Hawke in pursuit of the enemy mothership. However, Neo has tricked the ZAFT pilots into following a decoy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 癒えぬ傷痕
Scars that Won`t Heal
Blessures inguérissables
Ienu Kizuato
episode.summary: Aboard the Minerva, Chairman Durandal receives shocking news. The ruins of Junius Seven, the PLANT that was destroyed in the infamous Bloody Valentine incident and where the armistice treaty was later signed, have left their stable orbit and begun falling towards Earth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界の終わる時
The End of the World
Quand viendra la fin du monde
Sekai no Owaru Toki
episode.summary: The Minerva launches its mobile suits to support Yzak and his demolition crew. Shinn, Rey, Lunamaria, and Athrun join the battle against the mysterious group who have sent Junius Seven falling towards Earth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 混迷の大地
Land of Confusion
Terre de confusion
Konmei no Daichi
episode.summary: Despite the heroic efforts of its crew, the Minerva has been unable to avert disaster, and the fragments of Junius Seven inflict terrible damage as they fall across Earth`s surface. The Minerva retrieves Shinn and Athrun as they descend to Earth, then sets course for Orb in order to return Cagalli and repair the damage it has suffered in its space battles. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャンクション
Junction
Jonction
Junction
episode.summary: Once the Minerva arrives in Orb, Cagalli resumes her duties as Chief Representative. Her prime minister, Unato Ema Seiran, tells her of the damage caused by the fall of Junius Seven and urges her to approve an alliance with the Atlantic Federation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 驕れる牙
Bared Fangs
Les griffes de l`arrogance
Ogoreru Kiba
episode.summary: The Atlantic Federation and its allies declare war on the PLANTs in response to the fall of Junius Seven. Although Chairman Durandal still hopes for a diplomatic solution, the ZAFT forces are mobilized to defend the PLANTs. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 血に染まる海
Blood in the Water
La mer de sang
Chi ni Somaru Umi
episode.summary: The Minerva crew find an Earth Forces fleet waiting for them outside Orb`s territorial waters, leaving them no choice but to somehow break through the enemy lines. While Rey and Lunamaria guard the ship, Shinn fights an aerial battle against the Earth Forces mobile suits, but the tide turns against them as the enemy deploys a huge mobile armor whose positron deflector shield can withstand even the Minerva`s Tannhauser cannon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 選びし道
The Chosen Path
Le choix de son destin
Erabishi Michi
episode.summary: The conflict continues to escalate as Earth Forces fleets encircle the ZAFT bases at Gibraltar and Carpentaria, and the PLANT Supreme Council decides to strike back in the name of self-defense. Despite her best intentions, Cagalli yields to her ministers` demands that Orb ally itself with the Atlantic Federation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父の呪縛
A Father`s Spell
La malédiction du père
Chichi no Jubaku
episode.summary: Chairman Durandal tells the horrified Athrun the details of the Earth Forces` latest attack on the PLANTs. Giving up his Alex Dino alias, Athrun admits his true identity and begs Durandal not to let this conflict escalate into another war. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: よみがえる翼
Resurrected Wings
Les ailes de la résurrection
Yomigaeru Tsubasa
episode.summary: Thanks to Shinn`s fighting prowess, the Minerva has overcome the Earth Forces fleet. As the ship continues on to Carpentaria, the Orb government concludes its alliance with the Atlantic Federation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明日への出航[たびだち]
Flight to Tomorrow
Départ pour l’avenir
Asu e no Tabidachi
episode.summary: In the wake of the assassination attempt on Lacus, Kira and his friends realize that they have been targeted by the government of the PLANTs. Kira then receives a letter from his sister Cagalli, in which she tells him of her intention to marry Yuna and asks him to return Athrun`s ring on her behalf. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦場への帰還
Return to the Battlefield
Retour sur champ de bataille
Senjou e no Kikan
episode.summary: Aboard the Archangel, Cagalli berates the crew for abducting her in the middle of her wedding ceremony. Kira gives Athrun`s ring back to her, and gently asks Cagalli to join them in seeking a better answer to the world`s problems. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: (Parody of ep 06!) The World`s First One and a Half Hours
インド洋の死闘
Struggle in the Indian Ocean
Duel dans l’océan Indien
Indo You no Shitou
episode.summary: As the Minerva makes its way through the Indian Ocean, it draws the attention of an old enemy, Neo Roanoke of the elite Phantom Pain taskforce. Neo calls in support from the nearby Earth Forces and launches an aerial assault on the Minerva. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦士の条件
The Soldier`s Life
La marque du soldat
Senshi no Jouken
episode.summary: The fugitive Archangel is now hiding underwater in the neutral Kingdom of Scandinavia. Aboard the ship, Kira and his friends ponder their future plans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ローエングリンを討て!
Attack the Lohengrin
Détruisez le Lohengrin !
Lohengrin o Ute!
episode.summary: As the Minerva approaches the Lohengrin Gate, Athrun explains the battle plan to the other pilots. While the Minerva and the soldiers of the Mahamul base draw the attention of the Earth Forces, one pilot will attack the positron cannon via a hidden tunnel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見えない真実
The Hidden Truth
Une vérité dissimulée
Mienai Shinjitsu
episode.summary: The Minerva continues on to the shore of the Black Sea and docks at the city of Diocuia. Recently liberated from the control of the Earth Forces, Diocuia is now the latest stop on Meer Campbell`s morale-building concert tour. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: PAST
Past
Récapitulatif
Past
episode.summary: This episode recounts Shinn`s personal history. During the previous war, Shinn and his family lived peacefully in the neutral nation of Orb, but eventually even Orb was drawn into the conflict. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さまよう眸
Wandering Eyes
Regards errants
Samayou Hitomi
episode.summary: After their meeting with Chairman Durandal, the Minerva pilots are treated to a day of vacation and given rooms in one of Diocuia`s hotels, and Athrun receives an unexpected guest. The pilots also make the acquaintance of Heine Westenfluss, a FAITH member who has been assigned to the Minerva as an additional pilot. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蒼天の剣
Sword of the Blue Skies
L`épée céleste
Souten no Tsurugi
episode.summary: Yielding to pressure from the Earth Forces, the government of Orb has agreed to join the fight against ZAFT. An Orb expeditionary fleet commanded by Yuna Roma Seiran is dispatched to back up Neo Roanoke`s Phantom Pain taskforce. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦火の蔭
The Shadows of War
L`ombre de la guerre
Senka no Kage
episode.summary: The battle between the Minerva and the Orb fleet has been disrupted by the sudden appearance of the Archangel and Kira`s Freedom Gundam. Cagalli enters the battlefield and orders the Orb forces to cease fighting, but Neo pressures Yuna into continuing the battle, and the Orb fleet renews its attack on the damaged Minerva. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すれ違う視線
Differing Views
Regards fugitifs
Surechigau Shisen
episode.summary: The battered Minerva retreats to a port on the Sea of Marmara to repair the damage it sustained in the Dardanelles battle. Troubled by the chaos his former comrades created during the fighting, Athrun decides to leave the Minerva and go in search of the Archangel so that he can talk to Kira and the others in person. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 罪の在処
The Place of Sin
L`antre du péché
Tsumi no Arika
episode.summary: Athrun has arranged a meeting with Kira and Cagalli, but the old friends no longer see eye to eye. Even after hearing of the assassination attempt on Lacus, Athrun still believes in Chairman Durandal`s good intentions, and he returns to the Minerva after urging his friends to keep Orb from participating in the war. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束
The Promise
Promesses
Yakusoku
episode.summary: After running off alone to the Lodonia laboratory, the Extended soldier Stella Loussier has been captured by the Minerva`s pilots. Shinn brings the injured Stella aboard the Minerva, but the ship`s doctors are unable to treat her due to her abnormal physiology. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 届かぬ想い
Unfulfilled Feelings
Sentiments inexprimés
Todokanu Omoi
episode.summary: Even as Neo prepares for another attack on the Minerva, the ZAFT forces are on the trail of the Archangel and its crew. While Chairman Durandal supervises the pursuit of the fugitive Lacus, Captain Talia of the Minerva receives a report on Athrun`s secret meeting with Kira and Cagalli. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 残る命散る命
Survivors and Sacrifices
Survivre et mourir
Nokoru Inochi Chiru Inochi
episode.summary: As the Minerva struggles against the combined Orb and Earth Forces fleets, the Freedom Gundam and the Archangel appear on the battlefield once more. Cagalli pleads with the Orb forces to cease fighting, but Yuna orders them to continue their assault on the Minerva. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FATES
Fates
Destins
Fates
episode.summary: Lacus returns to space and joins her allies aboard the warship Eternal, which is now hidden inside a cluster of asteroids. Chairman Durandal orders his forces to continue searching for Lacus, insisting that she is merely an impostor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刹那の夢
A Fleeting Dream
Un rêve éphémère
Setsuna no Yume
episode.summary: In the aftermath of the battle at Crete, the Archangel retrieves survivors from the Orb fleet, who ask to join Cagalli in her fight to restore Orb`s ideals. Meanwhile, the Minerva is undergoing another round of repairs before continuing on to Gibraltar. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明けない夜
The Endless Night
Une nuit interminable
Akenai Yoru
episode.summary: Shinn and Rey have returned Stella to her allies in order to save her life. As punishment for defying military regulations, the two pilots are placed in detention while the ZAFT leadership determines their fate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ステラ
Stella
Stella
Stellar
episode.summary: The Destroy Gundam advances towards Berlin, crushing one city after another. The Archangel arrives to confront the Destroy, but even Kira`s Freedom Gundam is no match for its overwhelming power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 示される世界
The World Revealed
Quand le monde se dévoile
Shimesareru Sekai
episode.summary: After laying Stella`s body to rest, Shinn returns to the Minerva with a new determination. When Athrun visits Shinn`s room, he finds Shinn and Rey running combat simulations to prepare for a confrontation with the Freedom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪夢
Nightmare
Cauchemar
Akumu
episode.summary: Chairman Durandal has revealed the existence of Logos to the public, throwing the world into a state of confusion. Kira and Cagalli fear that their homeland is now in danger, and the Archangel begins making its way back to Orb. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 混沌の先に
Eve of Chaos
Par-delà le chaos
Konton no Saki ni
episode.summary: Although the Archangel has escaped the Minerva`s attack, the Freedom has been destroyed, and the ship itself badly damaged. After retrieving Kira, the Archangel continues on to Orb, while Shinn returns to the Minerva and receives a hero`s welcome. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アスラン脱走
Athrun on the Run
Asran déserte
Athrun Dassou
episode.summary: Chairman Durandal, accompanied by Meer Campbell, presents Shinn and Athrun with a pair of powerful new Gundams. Shinn is delighted with this gift, but Athrun is still upset that they were ordered to attack the Archangel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雷鳴の闇
Thunder in the Dark
Nuit de tonnerre
Raimei no Yami
episode.summary: As Athrun and Meyrin escape from Gibraltar in a stolen mobile suit, Shinn and Rey pursue them in the new Destiny and Legend Gundams. Claiming that the fugitives have stolen classified information, Chairman Durandal orders Shinn and Rey to shoot them down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新しき旗
A New Flag
Une nouvelle bannière
Atarashiki Hata
episode.summary: The ZAFT forces gather around Heaven`s Base as they wait for the Earth Forces to respond to Chairman Durandal`s ultimatum. Aboard the Minerva, Lunamaria channels her grief into anger at Logos, while Shinn does his best to comfort her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空のキラ
Kira of the Skies
Kira tout puissant
Tenkuu no Kira
episode.summary: ZAFT has captured Heaven`s Base only to find that Lord Djibril has fled to parts unknown, and Chairman Durandal orders his forces to track the fugitive down. Aboard the Archangel, Kira laments his own powerlessness and wonders what will happen next. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄金の意志
Legacy of Gold
Une détermination en or
Ougon no Ishi
episode.summary: Shinn and Rey receive medals for their exploits at Heaven`s Base, and Chairman Durandal awards them their own FAITH insignia. But a new crisis is already beginning, as ZAFT has discovered that Lord Djibril has taken refuge in Orb. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自由と正義と
Freedom and Justice
Liberté et justice
Jiyuu to Seigi to
episode.summary: Cagalli and her golden mobile suit Akatsuki have turned the tide of battle in Orb`s favor, but she now finds herself facing enemy reinforcements, in the form of the Minerva and Shinn`s Destiny Gundam. Even as the Archangel rushes to Cagalli`s aid, Kira and Lacus return from space with a pair of new Gundams. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃の声
A Call for Counterattack
Contre-attaque
Hangeki no Koe
episode.summary: The ZAFT forces renew their attack on Orb. Shinn and Rey enter the battlefield in the Destiny and Legend, and Athrun comes to Kira`s rescue with his new Infinite Justice Gundam. While the four Gundams clash, the battle situation abruptly changes, and Talia orders the ZAFT forces to withdraw. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リフレイン
Refrain
Refrain
Refrain
episode.summary: Aboard the Archangel, the injured Athrun thinks back upon the path he has followed to this point. Even though he saw the pointlessness of war during the previous conflict, he rejoined ZAFT and fought alongside the Minerva crew in order to bring the new war to an end. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人のラクス
Lacus Times Two
Deux Lacus
Futari no Lacus
episode.summary: The real Lacus Clyne has reappeared on the world stage, and the impostor has been exposed. While Chairman Durandal sends Meer Campbell into hiding, the ZAFT forces and their allies grapple with this new revelation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 変革の序曲
Prelude to Revolution
L`aube du changement
Henkaku no Jokyoku
episode.summary: Although the Requiem cannon has missed the PLANT capital of Aprilius, it has wreaked vast destruction on the surrounding PLANTs. In response, ZAFT sends its lunar orbital fleet to attack Requiem`s first relay station, while the Minerva rushes to the Daedalus base to capture the cannon itself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真実の歌
The Song of Truth
La chanson de la vérité
Shinjitsu no Uta
episode.summary: With the Daedalus base captured, Lord Djibril eliminated, and the Requiem relay stations safely under ZAFT control, Chairman Durandal`s victory now appears complete. As the world awaits Durandal`s next move, the Archangel heads for the free lunar city of Copernicus to monitor the situation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミーア
Meer
Meer
Meer
episode.summary: Lacus and her companions return to the Archangel, carrying with them the body of Meer Campbell. Now that Meer has given her life to save Lacus, Athrun is ashamed to realize how little he knew about her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新世界へ
To A New World
Vers un nouveau monde
Shin Sekai e
episode.summary: The fragile peace is shattered, as the world is once again thrown into turmoil by the announcement of Chairman Durandal`s Destiny Plan. To eliminate conflict and secure eternal peace and happiness, Durandal intends to use DNA analysis to assign every human being to his or her proper role in life, creating a regulated society without free will or desire. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レイ
Rey
Rey
Rey
episode.summary: By using the Requiem cannon against the Earth Forces` Arzachel base, Chairman Durandal has shown that he will destroy anyone who stands in the way of his Destiny Plan, and it is clear to all that Orb is his next target. The Orb space fleet and its allies scramble to attack the Daedalus base before Requiem can fire again, while the Archangel and Eternal attempt to destroy the cannon`s first relay station. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の力
The Last Power
Le pouvoir ultime
Saigo no Chikara
episode.summary: Having eliminated Requiem`s first relay station, the Archangel and Eternal rush to the moon to join the attack on the Daedalus base, only to find their way barred by the mobile fortress Messiah. Kira tells Athrun and the Archangel to continue on and destroy the Requiem cannon, while he and the Eternal stay behind to deal with Messiah. Source: crunchyroll

Seed Supernova er - World Wide Seed
